channel.title: gem5 on Blog of retrhelo
channel.description: Recent content in gem5 on Blog of retrhelo

item.title: Status message in M5
item.description: There’s a very interesting part of the gem5 Coding Style document, talking about different message status from M5. I consider them very useful for further work.

item.title: One step into gem5
item.description: “The gem5 simulator is a modular platform for computer-system architecture research, encompassing system-level architecture as well as processor microarchitecture. gem5 is a community led.”
